flow.descriptionCdata:
2d61483a-ab7a-4a94-ac87-1976bd6eb167.022df5b6-3d7a-46cf-b0b3-fca35a47d1ce.description=
This subflow was created by the Web Services Wizard to invoke the powerOnLogicalServers operation on https\://tufnellpark\:51443/hpio/controller/soap/v2?wsdl. Note that the inputs to this flow which correspond to web service inputs are optional inputs.  This is due to the fact that web services definitions usually incorrectly indicate that too many inputs are required, and mirroring those settings in the flow would force you to enter unused values when running the flow.  The xmlTemplate input on the Invoke Method 2 step of this flow contains a template of the xml message to be sent, and the fields preceded by the comment "<\!--Optional\:-->" or "<\!--zero or more repetitions-->" are those which the web service indicates are optional; all others are indicated to be required.

Inputs\:
host - The host that is running the web service
port - The port on the host running the web service
logicalServerNames0 - The input named powerOnLogicalServers|0|logicalServerNames of the complex type\: powerOnLogicalServers|0
serviceName - The input named powerOnLogicalServers|serviceName of the complex type\: powerOnLogicalServers

Responses\:
success - The SOAP command was accepted by the web service
failure - Something went wrong while making the SOAP request

Extra Results\:
document - The raw XML response of the web service
documentStripped - The XML response of the web service stripped of namespaces
requestId - The output given by the XPath\: /Envelope/Body/powerOnLogicalServersResponse/requestId/text()
2d61483a-ab7a-4a94-ac87-1976bd6eb167.12c8bcc5-7ab0-4cb3-afe8-38c790cd5f65.prompt=Service Instance Id 2d61483a-ab7a-4a94-ac87-1976bd6eb167.1509733e-5b37-410c-a135-9fad75df1e96.description=This workflow returns the component properties and values using Artifact APIs. result\: propertyNameValuesList\: pipe separated list of property name and values ( where each property name and values would be ; seprated and multiple values would be , seprated) e.g. - property 1; value1,value2|property 2; value3|property 3; value3,value4|........ 2d61483a-ab7a-4a94-ac87-1976bd6eb167.1cb112da-09e3-4e03-b998-125845c20f11.prompt=Resource Provider ID 2d61483a-ab7a-4a94-ac87-1976bd6eb167.2cb68ed0-bad3-4a9e-a1f9-6c77f9c18171.prompt=User Identifier 2d61483a-ab7a-4a94-ac87-1976bd6eb167.32f8a6e6-b6c5-4baa-9257-c8d2a53fb830.description=This workflow returns the component properties and values using Artifact APIs. result\: propertyNameValuesList\: pipe separated list of property name and values ( where each property name and values would be ; seprated and multiple values would be , seprated) e.g. - property 1; value1,value2|property 2; value3|property 3; value3,value4|........ 2d61483a-ab7a-4a94-ac87-1976bd6eb167.3eec17a8-f260-4398-b021-0b746b272902.prompt=Artifact ID 2d61483a-ab7a-4a94-ac87-1976bd6eb167.4ef34043-14dd-4aa8-abe8-0080f60c6e2d.description=This workflow returns the Resource provider details. Results\: providerSAP providerUsername providerPassword 2d61483a-ab7a-4a94-ac87-1976bd6eb167.54aca865-c773-48f5-bc2d-b15bdcf4b464.prompt=Artifact ID 2d61483a-ab7a-4a94-ac87-1976bd6eb167.57a8a965-cc96-44d3-9fb9-f7bba8e78d3c.prompt=User Identifier 2d61483a-ab7a-4a94-ac87-1976bd6eb167.77706bf6-30d3-4b5e-b412-15ada1c93e61.prompt=User Identifier 2d61483a-ab7a-4a94-ac87-1976bd6eb167.7d656ae3-9497-40d2-8982-5b60ff466e4d.prompt=Service Component Id 2d61483a-ab7a-4a94-ac87-1976bd6eb167.8b802cdf-1f1c-4593-8ed9-0406a5c5d357.prompt=User Identifier 2d61483a-ab7a-4a94-ac87-1976bd6eb167.cd59aca6-39cd-4826-b1d5-35d3d5bd4ffd.description=This workflow returns the component properties and values using Artifact APIs. result\: propertyNameValuesList\: pipe separated list of property name and values ( where each property name and values would be ; seprated and multiple values would be , seprated) e.g. - property 1; value1,value2|property 2; value3|property 3; value3,value4|........ 2d61483a-ab7a-4a94-ac87-1976bd6eb167.d5cd061f-81f9-4ae5-9bee-b32a20610157.prompt=Artifact ID 2d61483a-ab7a-4a94-ac87-1976bd6eb167.description=
Provision a server using MOE and add the Server Component under the respective Server Group.


Inputs\:
appServiceComponentId - Application Service component id
tierId - Software Application Tier Id. Server Component will be added under Server Group for this tier.
userIdentifier - CSA OO User Identifier 
svcInstanceId - Service Instance Id


Responses\:
   success - if the command completes execution and its exit code is 0
   failure - otherwise
flow.name: MOE Flex-Out

step.name: Add Logical Server to IO Service
